borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1. Sycamore - Remove dead branches. exemptionT5. Oak - Remove dead branches. exemption; T6. Sycamore x 2 - Remove dead branches. exemption T7. Holm Oak - Remove dead branches. exemption; T8.
